Class Knight

java.lang.Object
ChessPiece
Knight
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChessPieceContract
public class Knight extends ChessPiece
Represents a Knight chess piece. A knight moves in an L pattern: 2 cells in one direction and 1 cell perpendicular.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove(int row, int col)
      Description copied from interface: ChessPieceContract
      Determines if this chess piece can move to the given cell.
      Parameters:
      row - the target row
      col - the target column
      Returns:
      true if the piece can move to (row, col), false otherwise
